attributes.review: this app makes me wanna vomit! 🤮🤢not only does it not match the 👩🏿‍💻wallpaper 🤳on my phone 👻👾but it also looks like it was maintained by the 👔HOA 🏡committee in the 🏚 ca ghetto🎃🦾👁the way it 🦶smelled 👃gave me 👽✨sewer vibes✨🥵 and i didn’t like the 💋burning🥶 sensation when i tapped it. 🧜🏻‍♀️I’m just so glad it 🙅didn’t 🙅make 🎶👁‍🗨sounds 🌪bc if it did, it would probably sound like a 🚬🏺cross 🍃⚔️faded gorilla tweaking. 🧬🦍
attributes.title: 💩🤡🧻poopy app 🥱😝🤢💨

attributes.review: This app totally is messing with my phone, after I downloaded it none of my other apps would work and the notifications from this app take me out of my other apps when i get them. My phone is running so slow and the app has so many flaws I can’t imagine the kind of update it would take to fix it
attributes.title: NO THANKS

attributes.review: This app is absolutely terrible. My Grandma downloaded it and was very disappointed. She kept saying there was some kind of Glitch or something, when she first opened the app. She kept saying there was a picture of an Orange with hair or something. She was completely mortified and we had to cut off her life support cause she no longer wanted to live anymore. THIS APP KILLED MY GRANDMA!!
attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD!!!

attributes.review: You would NOT believe how terrible my experience with this app was 😡🤬 I opened the app. DO YOU WANT TO KNOW WHAT I SAW?! I highly doubt it. It ruined my whole night and left me feeling like I was going to T h r o w. U p. The app, of course taking 1.2 seconds to open (a millisecond more than other apps 🤬,) actually showed me a photo of DONALD TRUMP. I can not believe this. I’m gonna have nightmares for a whole MONTH. WORSTE APP EXPERIENCE EVERE.
attributes.title: AWFUL APP! DO NOT DOWNLOAD!!!

attributes.review: I came on this app because I love my president and I need to show my support against these meddling kids!!!!! Only to find out he died from gravity. He tripped and fell and bumped his head and his wife called the doctor and the doctor said he’s dead 😥😢😭. This app holds too much memories of r 🤢great🤮 president. So we must let it go and let us all move on to the next part of r lives 💔☹️......🥱🥳
attributes.title: R.I.P Donald Jambalaya Trump

attributes.review: Wow I’m very disappointed in this app. They are definitely against our GREAT president because they try to make him look UGLY and ORANGE instead of the beautiful man that he actually is. Liberal media is back at it with their FAKE news. AND this app only tell us RACIST and bigoted and misogynistic news instead of the CHRISTIAN LOVE that trump truly spreads. This app is the reason I won’t vote for trump! Needs to be deleted ASAP!!
attributes.title: Glitches

attributes.review: When I first opened the app the orange guy jumped out of the screen and killed my dog with a gun because she’s a female🤬🤬🤬🤬🤬🤬🤬he then broke my grandmas wheelchair and made her crawl back to “her own country” not to mention he threw my car across the planet and now I can’t even drive it due to not knowing it’s location i am very disappointed and would not download eva again
attributes.title: DISCOSTING 🤮🤮🤮😾😾🤬🤬🤬😡😡

attributes.review: This app (if I could even call it that, it’s more like a virus) is incredibly glitchy and really messed up my phone! I was trying to get updates about his campaign and now every time I try to open it, it crashes. Also my keyboard is permanently stuck on my home screen and I cannot access the apps underneath it. DO NOT GET.
attributes.title: Glitchy!

attributes.review: Bruh dis app legit no cap ate my pet hamster Melbert. How can they disrespect a homie such as Melbert now his child, supreme bean will live with the memory of his, father Melbert the legendary hamster coming back from the store with milk ( finally) only to be eaten alive by this ruthless app. To be more graphic this app is equally disturbing as people who poor their milk before their cereal, people who genuinely enjoy mathematics, and those that have the audacity to name their children: KÀRËÑ.
attributes.title: WORST APP IN THE HISTORY OF ICE AGE

attributes.review: I downloaded this app and within a hour my phone started to be so slow. My screen could just stay in one page no matter how much I tried to swipe. The app is slow not easy to use and I am 99.9% it is the reason my phone has a glitch now. A waste of time to get and a waste of storage space.
attributes.title: Terrible app
